:::T R A C K L i S T:::
01. Introduction
02. Just Another Day
03. Ballade Van 'n Boepens
04. Political Crimes
05. Taken
06. White Genocide
07. The Career
08. Civillisation
09. Brothers

The Third World Circus is a musical project born in South Africa, a country that is scarred by decades of racial segregation. With the Apartheid system being overthrown in 1994, we celebrate 20 years as a democracy in 2014. But despite the 20 years of freedom, racial tension is still a crippling issue in the country. 

Being part of the first generation that grew up after Apartheid, these racial conflicts and narrow-mindedness just seem ridiculous. Thus, The Third World Circus aims to badmouth the badmouthers; To make fun of peoples fears; To be racist against racists. 

Set out as a Progressive Heavy Metal album with elements of classical music, jazz and some local flavours, The Third World Circus tackles sensitive topics headfirst with copious loads of satire and irony.
